props.name: title
props.description: Text to use for the heading of the error summary block. If content is provided in the `title` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: description
props.description: Text to use for the description of the errors. If content is provided in the `description` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: disableAutoFocus
props.description: If `true`, keyboard focus will not be moved to the error summary when it's mounted.

slots.name: title
slots.description: The heading of the error summary block. If content is provided in this slot, the `title` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: description
slots.description: The description of the errors. If content is provided in this slot, the `description` prop will be ignored.
